description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Play as 1 of 4 online players with or against your friends in several game modes: Cooperative, Free For All, Team Death Match. Select 1 of 6 Experience Levels, in which you can fight with or against your friends to defeat the alien menace.
description.short: Play as 1 of 4 online players with or against your friends in several game modes: Cooperative, Free For All, Team Death Match. Select 1 of 6 Experience Levels, in which you can fight with or against your friends to defeat the alien menace.
